plugin.name: TeiidPlugin
plugin.description: Supports management and monitoring of JBoss Teiid

operation.name: getLongRunningRequests
operation.description: List current queries executing against the Teiid System that have surpassed the long running query threshhold

c:simple-property.name: getSessionId
c:simple-property.description: The name of the resource whose availability is being reported

c:simple-property.name: getCommand
c:simple-property.description: The SQL string for this query

c:simple-property.name: sourceRequest
c:simple-property.description: If false,this is the top level query. If true, this a physical source query.

c:simple-property.name: getExecutionId
c:simple-property.description: The execution id for this request (if this is a physical source query)

c:simple-property.name: getTransactionId
c:simple-property.description: The transaction XID if there is a transaction involved

c:simple-property.name: getNodeId
c:simple-property.description: The node ID of this query

operation.name: getSessions
operation.description: Get current sessions connected to the Teiid instance

c:list-property.name: list
c:list-property.description: Sessions currently connected to the Teiid system

c:simple-property.name: getClientHostName
c:simple-property.description: Host name from where the session created

c:simple-property.name: getIPAddress
c:simple-property.description: IP address from where this session was created

c:simple-property.name: getSecurityDomain
c:simple-property.description: Security Domain that session logged into

operation.name: deployVdbByUrl
operation.description: Deploy a VDB using a URL

c:simple-property.name: vdbUrl
c:simple-property.description: The URL of the VDB's source file.

c:simple-property.name: vdbDeployName
c:simple-property.description: The name of the VDB to deploy.

c:simple-property.name: vdbVersion
c:simple-property.description: The version to use for the deployed VDB. Leave blank to use the default version as determined by the deployer, overwrite a current version, or use the VDB file name version (i.e. vdbname.{version}.vdb). The version parameter is not applicable for deployment of dynamic VDBs.

c:simple-property.name: sessionID
c:simple-property.description: The ID of the session to terminate

operation.name: getRequests
operation.description: Get current requests executing against this Teiid instance

c:list-property.name: list
c:list-property.description: Requests currently executing against the Teiid system

c:simple-property.name: sourceRequest
c:simple-property.description: True if this is a connector level request

c:simple-property.name: getTransactionId
c:simple-property.description: Transaction XID if a transaction is involved

operation.name: cancelRequest
operation.description: Terminate the processing of a query and its source queries

c:simple-property.name: sessionID
c:simple-property.description: The ID of the session that the request to cancel is associated with

c:simple-property.name: requestID
c:simple-property.description: The ID of the request to cancel

operation.name: getTransactions
operation.description: Get current transactions executing against this VDB

c:list-property.name: list
c:list-property.description: Transactions currently executing against the Teiid system

c:simple-property.name: getId
c:simple-property.description: The Xid string for GLOBAL transactions or the Transaction id string LOCAL/REQUEST.

c:simple-property.name: getAssociatedSession
c:simple-property.description: Get the session associated with the this transaction. May be null for an unassociated Global transaction.

c:simple-property.name: getScope
c:simple-property.description: Get the scope for the transaction. Will be one of GLOBAL, LOCAL, or REQUEST

c:simple-property.name: transactionID
c:simple-property.description: The ID of the transaction to terminate

c:group.name: SessionSettings
c:group.displayName: Settings for the Data Services plugin. Will be reset with a server restart.

c:simple-property.name: displayPreviewVDBS
c:simple-property.description: If 'Yes', Preview VDBs (created by the Teiid Designer) will display in the Virtual Database resource grouping. The default is 'No'

c:group.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer
c:group.displayName: Runtime Engine Properties (restart required before modifications take effect)

c:simple-property.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer.maxRowsFetchSize
c:simple-property.description: Maximum allowed fetch size, set via JDBC. User requested value ignored above this value. (default 20480)

c:simple-property.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer.maxActivePlans
c:simple-property.description: Increase this value on highly concurrent systems - but ensure that the underlying pools can handle the increased load without timeouts.(default 20)

c:simple-property.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer.timeSliceInMilli
c:simple-property.description: Query processor time slice, in milliseconds. (default 2000)

c:simple-property.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer.lobChunkSizeInKB
c:simple-property.description: The max lob chunk size in KB transferred to the client for xml, blobs, clobs (default 100KB)

c:simple-property.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer.queryThresholdInSecs
c:simple-property.description: Length of time in seconds before a query is considered long running

c:simple-property.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer.useDataRoles
c:simple-property.description: Turn on role checking of resources based on the roles defined in VDB (default true)

c:simple-property.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer.detectingChangeEvents
c:simple-property.description: Set to true for the engine to detect local change events. Should be disabled if using external change data capture tools. (default true)

c:simple-property.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer.resultSetCacheEnabled
c:simple-property.description: Denotes whether or not result set caching is enabled. (default true)

c:simple-property.name: ResultSetCacheConfig.maxEntries
c:simple-property.description: The maximum number of result set cache entries. -1 indicates no limit. (default 1024)

c:simple-property.name: ResultSetCacheConfig.maxAgeInSeconds
c:simple-property.description: The maximum age of a result set cache entry in seconds. -1 indicates no max. (default 7200)

c:simple-property.name: ResultSetCacheConfig.maxStaleness
c:simple-property.description: The maximum staleness of a result set cache entry in seconds based upon data modifications. -1 indicates no max. (default 60)

c:simple-property.name: PreparedPlanCacheConfig.maxEntries
c:simple-property.description: The maximum number of prepared plan cache entries. -1 indicates no limit. (default 512

c:simple-property.name: PreparedPlanCacheConfig.maxAgeInSeconds
c:simple-property.description: The maximum age of a prepared plan cache entry in seconds. -1 indicates no max. (default 28800)

c:simple-property.name: PreparedPlanCacheConfig.maxStaleness
c:simple-property.description: The maximum staleness of a prepared plan cache entry in seconds based upon costing modifications. -1 indicates no max. (default 300)

c:simple-property.name: BufferService.maxBufferSpace
c:simple-property.description: Max file storage space, in MB, to be used for buffer files (default 50G)

c:simple-property.name: BufferService.processorBatchSize
c:simple-property.description: The max row count of a batch sent internally within the query processor. Should be <= the connectorBatchSize. (default 512)

c:simple-property.name: BufferService.connectorBatchSize
c:simple-property.description: The max row count of a batch from a connector. Should be even multiple of processorBatchSize. (default 1024)

c:simple-property.name: BufferService.maxProcessingBatchesColumns
c:simple-property.description: The number of batch columns guarenteed to a processing operation. Set this value lower if the workload typically processes larger numbers of concurrent queries with large intermediate results from operations such as sorting, grouping, etc. (default 128)

c:simple-property.name: BufferService.maxFileSize
c:simple-property.description: Max file size for buffer files (default 2GB)

c:simple-property.name: BufferService.maxReserveBatchColumns
c:simple-property.description: The number of batch columns to allow in memory (default 16384). This value should be set lower or higher depending on the available memory to Teiid in the VM. 16384 is considered a good default for a dedicated 32-bit VM running Teiid with a 1 gig heap.

c:simple-property.name: JdbcSocketConfiguration.inputBufferSize
c:simple-property.description: SO_RCVBUF size, 0 indicates that system default should be used (default 0)

c:simple-property.name: JdbcSocketConfiguration.outputBufferSize
c:simple-property.description: SO_SNDBUF size, 0 indicates that system default should be used (default 0)

c:simple-property.name: SessionService.sessionExpirationTimeLimit
c:simple-property.description: Max allowed time before the session is terminated by the system, 0 indicates unlimited (default 0)

c:simple-property.name: SessionService.sessionMaxLimit
c:simple-property.description: Maximum number of sessions allowed by the system (default 5000)

operation.name: getMaterializedViews
operation.description: List any Materialized Views for this VDB

c:list-property.name: list
c:list-property.description: List information related to Materialized Views, if any, for this VDB

c:simple-property.name: schemaName
c:simple-property.description: Name of the schema that is materialized

c:simple-property.name: valid
c:simple-property.description: Indicates if data in table is valid for use

operation.name: reloadMaterializedView
operation.description: Refresh a given Materialized View for this VDB

c:simple-property.name: schema
c:simple-property.description: The schema name of the Materialized View to refresh

c:simple-property.name: table
c:simple-property.description: The name of the Materialized View to refresh

c:simple-property.name: invalidate
c:simple-property.description: If yes, will block all queries against the current Materialized View table until data is refreshed.

operation.name: clearCache
operation.description: Clears the cache for a given type for this VDB

metric.description: Whether or not errors exist for this VDB

c:simple-property.name: vdbVersion
c:simple-property.description: The version to use for the deployed VDB. Leave blank to use the default version as determined by the deployer, overwrite a current version, or use the VDB file name version (i.e. vdbname.{version}.vdb). The version parameter is not applicable for deployment of dynamic VDBs.

c:simple-property.name: connectionType
c:simple-property.description: Allowable Connections: 1) NONE - disallow new connections 2) BY VERSION - allow connections only if the version is specified or if this is the earliest 'BY VERSION' vdb and there are no vdbs marked as 'ANY' 3) ANY - allow connections with or without a version specified. If multiple versions of same VDB are deployed, connect to one specified with ANY, or if there are multiple VDBs with ANY then connect to the latest version with ANY

c:list-property.name: translators
c:list-property.description: The translator overrides for this VDB

c:list-property.name: singleSourceModels
c:list-property.description: The source models for this VDB

c:simple-property.name: supportsMultiSource
c:simple-property.description: Determines if this model supports multi-source bindings

c:list-property.name: multiSourceModels
c:list-property.description: The multi-source model sources for this VDB

c:list-property.name: logicalModels
c:list-property.description: The logical models for this VDB

c:simple-property.name: anyAuthenticated
c:simple-property.description: Indicates if the role is mapped to any authenticated user

c:list-property.name: mappedRoleNameList
c:list-property.description: Mapped role names for this data role
